${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:MagicStrike.NAME: Magic Strike
${modID}:MagicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kid:Flip 3 random cards to Kid:Face-down.

${modID}:AlertHint.NAME: Alert Hint
${modID}:AlertHint.DESCRIPTION: Kid:Actual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Select !M! cards to Kid:Flip to Kid:Face-up .

${modID}:FaceMask.NAME: Face Mask
${modID}:FaceMask.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Kid:Flip 3 random cards to Kid:Face-down .

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Kid:Actual. Deal !D! damage. NL Select !M! cards to Kid:Flip.

${modID}:PokerFace.NAME: Poker Face
${modID}:PokerFace.DESCRIPTION: If all cards in your hand are Kid:Face-down , gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Shuffle.NAME: Shuffle
${modID}:Shuffle.DESCRIPTION: Kid:Flip all cards in your hand.

${modID}:DeckInsight.NAME: Deck Insight
${modID}:DeckInsight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M! cards. Kid:Flip all scryed cards to Kid:Face-up.

${modID}:Swap.NAME: Swap
${modID}:Swap.DESCRIPTION: Swap the energy cost of 2 cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Teleport.NAME: Teleport
${modID}:Teleport.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and Kid:Flip them to Kid:Face-down.

${modID}:KnockOut.NAME: Knock Out
${modID}:KnockOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kid:Flip all cards in your hand to Kid:Face-down.

${modID}:PokerGun.NAME: Poker Gun
${modID}:PokerGun.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of Kid:Face-down cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

${modID}:Recapture.NAME: Recapture
${modID}:Recapture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile to your hand. Kid:Flip them to Kid:Face-down.

${modID}:Notice.NAME: Notice
${modID}:Notice.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Notice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cheat.NAME: Cheat
${modID}:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: Select a Kid:Face-down card in your hand. NL Play it without energy cost.

${modID}:PhantomSteal.NAME: Phantom Steal
${modID}:PhantomSteal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exchange your draw pile with your discard pile.

${modID}:RepeatTrick.NAME: Repeat Trick
${modID}:RepeatTrick.DESCRIPTION: Play the card on top of discard pile. NL Increase energy cost by 1 each time this card is played.

${modID}:GrandPrelude.NAME: Grand Prelude
${modID}:GrandPrelude.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Kid:Charm. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OmnipotentPocket.NAME: Omnipotent Pocket
${modID}:OmnipotentPocket.DESCRIPTION: Draw until your hand is full or draw a Kid:Face-up card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:OmnipotentPocket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw until your hand is full or draw a Kid:Face-up card.

${modID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${modID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Kid:Actual. NL Gain !B! blocks. NL Shuffle a *miracle into your draw pile.
${modID}:Prepare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! blocks. NL Shuffle a *miracle+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:Sneak.NAME: Sneak
${modID}:Sneak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! blocks. NL Retain all Kid:Face-down cards in your hand.

${modID}:Raid.NAME: Raid
${modID}:Raid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Kid:Flipped, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:MagicGlove.NAME: Magic Glove
${modID}:MagicGlove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Select !M! cards to Kid:Flip.

${modID}:MysticTechniques.NAME: Mystic Techniques
${modID}:MysticTechniques.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Kid:Flipped, gain [E] [E] .

${modID}:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
${modID}:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Clear all buffs except Strength from them. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Cleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Clear all positive buffs except Strength from them. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StunGun.NAME: Stun Gun
${modID}:StunGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Stun the enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cardistry.NAME: Cardistry
${modID}:Cardistry.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each time this card is Kid:Flipped in this turn. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times.

${modID}:MindMagic.NAME: Mind Magic
${modID}:MindMagic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Kid:Flip a card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Flashbang.NAME: Flashbang
${modID}:Flashbang.DESCRIPTION: Kid:Actual. NL Set all hand cards to Kid:Face-up. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Flashbang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Kid:Actual. NL Set all hand cards to Kid:Face-up.

${modID}:HeartfeltApologies.NAME: Heartfelt Apologies
${modID}:HeartfeltApologies.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have no Kid:Face-down cards in hand. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have Face-down cards in hand.

${modID}:TrickExposure.NAME: Trick Exposure
${modID}:TrickExposure.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Kid:Face-down card, Kid:Flip it to Kid:Face-up.
${modID}:TrickExposure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Kid:Face-down card, Kid:Flip it to Kid:Face-up.

${modID}:UnparalleledSkill.NAME: Unparalleled Skill
${modID}:UnparalleledSkill.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, Kid:Flip it to Kid:Face-down.

${modID}:Peek.NAME: Peek
${modID}:Peek.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the Kid:Charm you have. NL Remove all Kid:Charm.

${modID}:CoverUp.NAME: Cover-Up
${modID}:CoverUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Add 2 *FakeGem to your hand. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:CoverUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Add 1 *FakeGem to your hand. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:WhiteCloak.NAME: White Cloak
${modID}:WhiteCloak.DESCRIPTION: Kid:Actual. NL Gain !B! block. NL Choose to Kid:Flip !M! cards in your hand.

${modID}:Transmitter.NAME: Transmitter
${modID}:Transmitter.DESCRIPTION: Kid:Actual. NL Kid:Mark a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LoopholeDetection.NAME: Loophole Detection
${modID}:LoopholeDetection.DESCRIPTION: Kid:Mark the card with the highest energy cost in your hand.

${modID}:PupilOfMoon.NAME: Pupil of Moon
${modID}:PupilOfMoon.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Gain !M! temporary Dexterity. NL Discard when you deal damage.

${modID}:MotherOfGems.NAME: Mother of Gems
${modID}:MotherOfGems.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card. NL Discard when you discard a card.
${modID}:MotherOfGems.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL Discard when you discard a card.

${modID}:DarkStar.NAME: Dark Star
${modID}:DarkStar.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Discard when you receive damage.

${modID}:BlueBirthday.NAME: Blue Birthday
${modID}:BlueBirthday.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] . NL Discard when you play !M! cards.

${modID}:Pandora.NAME: Pandora
${modID}:Pandora.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, heal !M! HP. NL Discard when other Kid:Gems in your hand.

${modID}:BloodTears.NAME: Blood Tears
${modID}:BloodTears.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, choose to Exhaust !M! card in your hand.
${modID}:BloodTears.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, choose to Exhaust !M! cards in your hand.

${modID}:ElfLips.NAME: Elf Lips
${modID}:ElfLips.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Display Kid:Face-down cards' rarity. NL Discard when you play a Kid:Face-up card.
${modID}:ElfLips.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Display Kid:Face-down cards' rarity.

${modID}:Vanish.NAME: Vanish
${modID}:Vanish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 2 cards and Kid:Flip them to Kid:Face-down.

${modID}:CardTrick.NAME: Card Trick
${modID}:CardTrick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every time you kid:Flip a card in this combat, increase damage by !M!.

${modID}:Fish.NAME: Fish
${modID}:Fish.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, discard all Kid:Gems in your hand. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:Flee.NAME: Flee
${modID}:Flee.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Fish into your draw pile.

${modID}:SilverBullet.NAME: Silver Bullet
${modID}:SilverBullet.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Kid:Gem in your hand. Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You don't have Gem in hand!

${modID}:WonderForm.NAME: Wonder Form
${modID}:WonderForm.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Kid:Face-down card, reduce its [E] by 1. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:WonderForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Kid:Face-down card, reduce its [E] by 1.

${modID}:DualIdentity.NAME: Dual Identity
${modID}:DualIdentity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kid:Flipped when played and change to Skill card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flipped when played.
Gain !B! Block. NL Flipped when played.

${modID}:Restitution.NAME: Restitution
${modID}:Restitution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a Kid:Gem, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Steal.NAME: Steal
${modID}:Steal.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Kid:Gem from your draw pile and put it into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Steal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose a Kid:Gem from your draw pile and put it into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Scout.NAME: Scout
${modID}:Scout.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, choose !M! card from discard pile to Retain.

${modID}:Counterfeit.NAME: Counterfeit
${modID}:Counterfeit.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand and add !M! copies of it to your hand. Copies are Ethereal. Exhaust.

${modID}:Forgery.NAME: Forgery
${modID}:Forgery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Copy a random card in your hand. Copy is Ethereal.

${modID}:SleepGas.NAME: Sleep Gas
${modID}:SleepGas.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !M! Strength . NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Skywalk.NAME: Skywalk
${modID}:Skywalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Kid:Flipped, Gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

${modID}:TowerDiamond.NAME: Tower Diamond
${modID}:TowerDiamond.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength for each time this card is Kid:Flipped in this turn.
${modID}:TowerDiamond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength for each time this card is Kid:Flipped in this turn. NL Retain.

${modID}:Disguise.NAME: Disguise
${modID}:Disguise.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose kid:Charm.
${modID}:Disguise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next 2 times you would lose kid:Charm.

${modID}:Boast.NAME: Boast
${modID}:Boast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Kid:Flipped, shuffle 2 *FakeGems into your draw pile. NL Kid:Flip this card.

${modID}:MasterThief.NAME: Master Thief
${modID}:MasterThief.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 random Kid:Gem to your hand.

${modID}:ParisSunshine.NAME: Paris Sunshine
${modID}:ParisSunshine.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Kid:Charm.

${modID}:Curtsy.NAME: Curtsy
${modID}:Curtsy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Kid:Charm for each Kid:Face-down card in your hand.

${modID}:ArmsCarry.NAME: Arms Carry
${modID}:ArmsCarry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Kid:Charm equal to the damage dealt.

${modID}:Ingratiate.NAME: Ingratiate
${modID}:Ingratiate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Kid:Charm greater than !M!, draw 1 card and gain [E] .

${modID}:Reason.NAME: Reason
${modID}:Reason.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card in your deck. NL If the next kid:Face-down card you play is the chosen card, gain [E] .
${modID}:Reason.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card in your deck. NL If the next kid:Face-down card you play is the chosen card, gain [E] [E] .

${modID}:HatTrick.NAME: Hat Trick
${modID}:HatTrick.DESCRIPTION: If you play 3 same cards in a row, deal !M! damage to all enemies.
